name: the religioning
description:
history rewritten: alternate history where religion never existed

player one is the first person (preacher) to discover religion and it is the job to convert the heathens.

(preacher controls: w,a,s,d), spacebar activates the conversion zone wich is used to convert the eathens when they are inside.

player 2 is the heathen (up,down,left,right) and must escape the preacher for as long as possible.

the original idea was to have health for the preacher and weapons for the heathen so it isnt all one sided but we ran out of time :(
